6par_gamma.h

49 #ifndef _LIB_6PAR_GAMMA_H_
50 #define _LIB_6PAR_GAMMA_H_
51 
52 #include "6par_newton.h"
53 
54 template< typename Real >
55 class __PTnonlinear
56 {
57 private:
58  Real Tc, Io, Il, a, Rs, Rsh;
59  Real Vguess, Iguess;
60 
61 public:
62  __PTnonlinear( Real _T, Real _Io, Real _Il, Real _a, Real _aIsc, Real _Adj, Real _V, Real _I, Real _Rs, Real _Rsh, Real Egref, Real Tref )
63  {
64  Tc = _T+273.15;
65 
66  Rs = _Rs;
67  Rsh = _Rsh;
68 
69  // initial conditions
70  Vguess = _V;
71  Iguess = _I;
72 
73  // calculate 3 temp dependent parameters
74  Real Eg = (1-0.0002677*(Tc-Tref))*Egref;
75 
76  a = _a*Tc/Tref;
77  Io = _Io* pow( Tc/Tref, 3)*exp( 11600 * (Egref/Tref - Eg/Tc));
78  Il = _Il + (_aIsc*(1-_Adj/100))*(Tc-Tref);
79  }
80 
81  void operator() ( const Real x[2], Real f[2] )
82  {
83  Real V = x[0];
84  Real I = x[1];
85 
86  f[0] = V*( Io/a*exp( (V+I*Rs)/a ) + 1/Rsh ) / ( 1 + Rs/Rsh + Io*Rs/a*exp( (V+I*Rs)/a ) ) - I;
87  f[1] = Il - Io*(exp( (V+I*Rs)/a ) - 1) - (V + I*Rs)/Rsh - I;
88  }
89 
90  int solve( Real *Pt )
91  {
92  Real x[2], resid[2];
93  x[0] = Vguess;
94  x[1] = Iguess;
95 
96  bool check = false;
97  int niter = newton<Real, __PTnonlinear, 2>(x, resid, check, *this, 100, 1e-7, 1e-7, 0.9);
98  if (check) niter = -5;
99 
100  if (niter >= 0 && check == false)
101  {
102  *Pt = x[0] * x[1]; // calculate power (P=V*I)
103  return niter;
104  }
105  else
106  return niter;
107  }
108 };
109 
110 template< typename Real >
111 bool mod6par_gamma_approx( Real *result,
112  Real Io, Real Il, Real a,
113  Real aIsc, Real Adj, Real Vmp, Real Imp, Real Rs, Real Rsh, Real Egref, Real Tref )
114 {
115  Real Tc_last=-999, Pmax_last=-999;
116  Real gamma, gamma_sum = 0.0;
117  int nsum = 0;
118  float nfail = 0;
119  float ntotal = 0;
120 
121  for (Real Tc = -10; Tc <= 50.0; Tc += 3.0 )
122  {
123  __PTnonlinear<Real> power_t( Tc,
124  Io, Il, a, aIsc, Adj, Vmp, Imp, Rs, Rsh, Egref, Tref );
125 
126  Real Pmax = 0.0;
127  int niter = power_t.solve( &Pmax );
128  if ( niter >= 0 )
129  {
130  if (Tc_last != -999)
131  {
132  gamma = (Pmax-Pmax_last)*100/(Vmp*Imp*(Tc-Tc_last));
133  gamma_sum += gamma;
134  nsum ++;
135  }
136 
137  Tc_last = Tc;
138  Pmax_last = Pmax;
139  }
140  else
141  {
142  nfail++;
143  }
144 
145  ntotal++;
146  }
147 
148  if (nsum > 2)
149  *result = gamma_sum / nsum;
150 
151  return ( nsum > 2 && nfail/ntotal < 0.3f ); // accept 1/3 of solutions fail over course of Tc iterations
152 }
153 #endif
